name: translationCore
description: Repository for the desktop application translationCore

packageJSON.name: translation_core
packageJSON.description: A bridge between TS and TM

scripts.build-win: xcopy src out /Y /E && npm run compile && node scripts/build-win.js
scripts.build-mac: cp -R src/ out/ && npm run compile && build --mac
scripts.build-lin: cp src/* out/ && npm run compile && build --linux

releases.name: translationCore v0.2.0 Beta
releases.body:
The official Beta releases for translationCore.

Features in this Release:
- Sources for translationNotes got cleaned up
- Brand new menu to maximize screen space
- Renamed translationWords to importantWords

Issues Fixed in this Release:
- USFM opening has been fixed
- Chunks are no longer a mandatory section in the manifest. 
- Word dragging works better now

releases.name: translationCore v0.1.11
releases.body:
**New Features with this Release**
- Feedback system and bug reporting
- Completely moved everything to the new modal.

### Troubleshooting

If you encounter a white screen, it is likely that the app is expecting a translationCore directory to be in your user directory: `~/translationCore`

releases.name: translationCore v0.1.10
releases.body:
*This is the last release before beta*

**Issues Fixed in this Release**
- Issue with reports
- Proposed Changes and Comment Box save data correctly now

**Features and Enhancements in this Release**
- Menu option to close program
- New UI throughout, a lot of designs implemented
- Brand new application modal
- New source for translationWords

releases.name: translationCore v0.1.9
releases.body:
Issues Fixed in this Release
- A check is now made to ensure dependencies are installed for tools
- Reports work again
- Small bug in opening recent projects

New Features or Enhancements in this Release
- Brand new menu
    - Includes nicer looking Group Names
- New UI for core
- New UI for translationWords and translationNotes
- New help tab for tools
- Tools come prepackaged with the app

releases.name: translationCore v0.1.8
releases.body:
Issues Fixed in this Release
- Package Manager should work now

New Features or Enhancements in this Release
- New scripturePane
- Non-happy-path testing
- React component tests
- OS X Build (behind on it's features, but it's here)

releases.name: translationCore v0.1.7
releases.body:
Issues fixed in this release:
- #293 Issues discovered in tC v0.1.5
  - #332 Desktop icons created
  - Better error message for logging in 
  - Reworked the tutorial
- #342 Cleaned up the Tools
- #303 Updating USFM loading process to new work flow

Features and enhancements added in this release:
- #311 UI Enhancements for Core
  - #302 New Menu and Submenu
  - #317 New progress circles for groups
  - #306 Headings in sidebar implemented
  - #318 Chevron Menu Structure
- #312 Integration and Unit testing
  - #347 Integration with Travis CI

releases.name: translationCore v0.1.6
releases.body:
Issues fixed in this release:
- #201 Frozen loading screens fixed
- #304 Issue with Original Language in tPane
- #307 Fixed fatal loading bug in translationWords 

Features added in this release:
- Developer mode
- #224 Data is packaged with checks now, allowing full offline usage
- #250 Slightly new navigation bar
- #273 User accounts persistance
- #274 Gateway language is saved with check

releases.name: translationCore v0.1.5
releases.body:
This release brings in the new package manager, and a whole host of other features. 
- Tools have resources bundled with them
- New UI
- More ways to import projects

releases.name: translationCore 0.1.4
releases.body:
## Issues fixed in this version:
- Numerous issues with drag to select.

## Features implemented in this version:
- Better error handling
- New report views

releases.name: translationCore 0.1.3
releases.body:
## Issues Fixed in this Release
- #152 Report view not working when logged in

## Features Added in this Release
- New check module icons
- Actual settings under settings

releases.name: translationCore 0.1.2
releases.body:
### Issues fixed in this release:
- Reports styling
- Report opening speed
- Project opening in some circumstances
- Parse issues on translationNotes
- Application won't crash on incomplete projects

### Features added in this release:
- Check apps are sorted
- Projects and modules are reopened when app is reopened
- USFM support
- Better error handling for sync errors
- Revamped version of translationNotes
- A logged in user can view their Door43 projects
- Numerous UI changes
- Recent projects are displayed and can be opened
- Check apps are displayed in the main part of the page
- Metadata saved with reports
- Example check module is now hidden
- Api notifications are used more often

releases.name: translationCore v0.1.1
releases.body:
Issues fixed with this release:
- #53 Update all references to .auth to Authorization.json
- #37 Address why an empty authorization file still permits api calls
- #18 Move all authentication into a single file.

Features added with this release:
- #36 Add Greek Morphology for the lexicon popovers
- #32 Support for languages read from right to left 5
- #54 Added the usual way for macs to quit

releases.name: Version 0.1.0 Release
releases.body: This releases main purpose is for demos, but includes all functionality except for registration.
